metadata.title: Flash Survey on SARS-CoV-2 Infections in Pediatric Patients on anti-Cancer Treatment

abstract.original_text: Thus, even children receiving anti-cancer chemotherapy may have a mild or asymptomatic course of COVID-19. While we should not underestimate the risk of developing a more severe course of COVID-19 than observed here, the intensity of preventive measures should not cause delays or obstructions in oncological treatment.

sentences.segment_text: Thus , even children receiving anti-cancer chemotherapy may have a mild or asymptomatic course of COVID-19 .
While we should not underestimate the risk of developing a more severe course of COVID-19 than observed here ,
the intensity of preventive measures should not cause delays or obstructions in oncological treatment .
